name: Go Back to Sleep
description:
A short sci-fi puzzle game made on Unity.

Attributions:

  • Cryopod models were from epilogueronin, from Sketchfab.
  • Scenery from the Sci-fi styled modular pack by karboosx, from Unity’s store.
  • sci-fi PBRs from freepbr.com.
  • The typeface used is Ailerons by Agonz Oliviera.
  • The skybox is the Starfield Skybox by Pulsar Bytes from the Unity asset store.
  • Sound fx from BBC’s sound effects library, pixabay.com by creators unfa and naxxfish and Kenney.nl.
